text:
In a <propertyfile> task, I have the following parameter. It is the only parameter.
The value originally contained a string followed by a property, but I changed it to a simple string to see if it would make a difference. It did not.

<entry key="helpsetpath" value="file:C:/g/ediwatch/help/iisrc_new/" />

The result in the updated property file is

helpsetpath=file\:C\:/g/ediwatch/help/iisrc_new/
                =

The added backslash after "file" causes it not to work.

Thank you.
creator: patricia_shan8@hotmail.com

text:
See:
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/util/Properties.html
in particular the store method.
creator: peterreilly@apache.org
